column4: I havn't encountered the ext4 bug. And was moving 95gb of mp3's and 40gb of 700-1.4gb files around. (On an OLD 933mhz machine)
ext4 bug WAS HIT when creating an external HD  ext4 partition. Going into RO mode. Journal errors. The Works.
the EXT4 massive data loss bug is serious... I am worried....
